translations: v.俯冲；突然袭击；（尤指鸟）猛扑；（非正式）猛地抓起

sentences.sentence: Maybe God swoops me up upon death.
Swoops just in time to his remembered tree.
sentences.translation: 恰好及时地冲回他记得的树干。

sentences.sentence: The butterflies are flapping wildly. A security guard swoops in.
sentences.translation: 蝴蝶扑扇着翅膀四散开来，一个保安冲了进来。
